notes: Final years of first-generation Saturn S-Series. Polymer body panels, space frame construction. Built at Spring Hill, Tennessee. Timing chain engines. Replaced by Ion 2003. Data sourced from Wikipedia Saturn S-Series article, January 2025 revision.

Saturn L-Series mid-size sedan/wagon. Based on Opel Vectra platform (GM2900). Built at Wilmington, Delaware. Timing chain engines. L100/L200/L300 trim levels. Data sourced from Wikipedia Saturn L-Series article, January 2025 revision.

Saturn Vue compact crossover SUV. First generation (2002-2007) built at Spring Hill. Second generation (2008-2010) rebadged Opel Antara. Green Line hybrid (2007-2009) with BAS mild hybrid system. AWD available. Timing chain engines. Data sourced from Wikipedia Saturn Vue article, January 2025 revision.

Saturn Ion compact sedan, S-Series replacement. Delta platform shared with Chevy Cobalt. Quad Coupe featured rear-hinged rear doors. Red Line performance variant with supercharged Ecotec. Built at Spring Hill, Tennessee. Timing chain engines. Data sourced from Wikipedia Saturn Ion article, January 2025 revision.

Saturn Relay minivan. Rebadged Chevrolet Uplander/Pontiac Montana SV6 on GMT200 platform. Built at Doraville, Georgia. Timing chain V6 engines. Short production run, discontinued 2007. Data sourced from Wikipedia Saturn Relay article, January 2025 revision.

Saturn Sky roadster. Kappa platform shared with Pontiac Solstice, Opel GT. Rear-wheel drive sports car. Red Line turbo variant with 260 hp. Built at Wilmington, Delaware. Timing chain engines. Data sourced from Wikipedia Saturn Sky article, January 2025 revision.

Saturn Aura mid-size sedan. Epsilon platform shared with Chevy Malibu, Pontiac G6. Green Line hybrid variant with BAS mild hybrid system. Built at Kansas City, Kansas. Timing chain engines. Data sourced from Wikipedia Saturn Aura article, January 2025 revision.

Saturn Outlook full-size crossover SUV. Lambda platform shared with GMC Acadia, Buick Enclave, Chevy Traverse. Eight-passenger seating. Built at Lansing, Michigan. Timing chain V6. AWD available. Data sourced from Wikipedia Saturn Outlook article, January 2025 revision.
